customhtml2.customHTML:
Comfort, Meet Speed

Comfort,
Meet Speed

A super shoe made for trail! The all-new Mont Blanc Carbon has a full-length carbon plate,
lightweight techy midsole, and underfoot grip for your fastest all-day technical trail runs.

Super Shoe For
Super Speed

Super Shoe For Super Speed

A full-length carbon plate in a trail shoe? Oh, yes, we did! A full-length Carbitexâ„¢ Monoflex carbon plate boosts propulsion, enhances underfoot protection, and encourages stability as you fly over technical terrain.

customhtml2.customHTML:
Techy Dual Midsole

It's got a lightweight and responsive midsole with
rim and core construction.

Snag some comfort with Altra EGOâ„¢ MAX in the rim and get enhanced race-day performance with Altra EGOâ„¢ PRO in the core. Whether it's rollers, up-and-downs, or gnarly rocks, you've got a midsole that won't slow you down.

Sticky Grip

Sketchy downhill skree? With VibramÂ® Litebase to reduce outsole weight and VibramÂ® Megagrip for unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces, you've got the underfoot traction and confidence to fly down.

customhtml2.customHTML:
Altra Comfort with
A Roomy Toe Box

Altra Comfort with A Roomy Toe Box

Hit the dirt and send it! The new Mont Blanc Carbon gives you a roomy toe box and zero drop, with a secure midfoot so you can move the way you were designed to on tough terrain.
